ecommerce.title: Custom E-Commerce Development Services
ecommerce.description: We help clients in the highly competitive e-commerce industry win each new customer.

fintech.title: FinTech and Banking Web Development
fintech.description: We built a strong digital presence for banking and financial services.

informationTechnology.title: Web Development Services for IT Companies
informationTechnology.description: We push IT-companies to the cutting edge of technological progress.

mediaAndMarketing.title: Custom Development for Media-Related Companies
mediaAndMarketing.description: We deliver high-quality experiences capable of handling large-scale data and any scale of concurrent users.

ecommerce.title:
Custom E-Commerce
Development Services
ecommerce.paragraph: In the constantly growing and highly competitive e-commerce industry every page, every metric, and every customer opinion plays a huge role. We’re ready to transform your design layouts into well performing websites to boost your sales.
ecommerce.imgAlt: Illustration with two figures of people, a man conveys something to a girl

fintech.title:
Fintech and Banking
Web Development
fintech.paragraph: The financial industry is expanding its digital presence, moving more and more services online to meet rising consumer demand. With this transition comes a growing need for higher digital security standards. Find out how we can help.

informationTechnology.title:
Web Development Services
for IT Companies
informationTechnology.paragraph: The IT industry is always on the cutting edge of technological progress. The effort to adapt to new technologies as quickly as possible is not only a desire but also the key to success in this industry. We help these companies become market leaders.

mediaAndMarketing.title:
Custom Development
for Media-Related Companies
mediaAndMarketing.paragraph: Throughout history, entertainment has been intertwined with culture, so it’s unsurprising that it has a vast presence on the web. We’ve helped many media companies grow and evolve. Reach out to us to find out how we can help you.

facts.heading: Development With a Personal Approach
facts.subHeading: Regardless of the size or duration of your project, we provide personalized services and flexible terms.

coreValues.heading: Core Values
coreValues.subHeading: We maintain the highest standards of web development and apply best practices to each project.

firstItem.title: Accessibility
firstItem.text: Did you know that up to 15% of all users have special needs when using the Internet? Each page and block should not only be well written, but should also be appropriately delivered, so that every user can enjoy it.

secondItem.title: Web Security
secondItem.text: Even a small vulnerability can lead to significant financial and reputational risks. From the beginning, we think carefully about code architecture and pay special attention to security issues.

thirdItem.title: UX
thirdItem.text: Perfectionism has to be smart. We always put ourselves in the place of the user and pay attention to the little things that can affect users’ opinions about the final product.

firstItem.heading: Gazprom Neft — Professionals 4.0
firstItem.text: Professionals 4.0 project for Gazprom Neft connects major corporations with talented performers.

secondItem.heading: S7 Airlines — Personal Account
secondItem.text: Frontend development of S7 Airlines' personal account that provides quick access to the Airline's services.

mosoblgaz.heading: Mosoblgaz — Personal Account
mosoblgaz.text: Development of b2b client's account that allows quick access to the company's services.

brusnika.heading: Brusnika — Internal assessment and forecasting tools
brusnika.text: Creation of internal sales planning tools for the company's managers.

mindbox.heading: Mindbox — Personal Account Data Filtering
mindbox.text: Development of two projects for marketing automation.

qmarketing.heading: QMarketing — QAcademy
qmarketing.text: Front-end development of internal pages for the e-learning platform.
